title: paalayamam paramEsvara
language:
Sanskrit

Pallavi

PAlayamAm Parameswara Sankara
SailasuthAvarA Sasadhara Sekhara
(paalaya)

Anu
sahitya:
Neelakandhara hara palita munivara
Palalochana kala kAla tripurahara
(paalaya)

CaraNam

ParamakripAkara durita vidoora
SaraNajanAdhArA SambarAri harA
VAraNacharmAmbara vara JahnavidharA
Parama purusha vAsudeva kritAdhara
(paalaya)
